page.title: 05A typical Saturday
page.content: At about 8am on Saturday morning I get up.I put the television on and watch Wide Awake Club or Saturday Picture Show.Then the rest of the family gets up.At about 9am I get my breakfast which is Ready Brek and a cup of tea.I then go for my friend Mo,but sometimes he goes to work with his dad,so I play with Anthony and Mark.We sometimes play football in Mo's yard.He usually goes in goal.At about 10.30 we go in the pit,our local play area.We sometimes go on the obstacle course on the wooden frames.Then I get my bike out and we go for some sweets and a comic.After dinner all the little kids come out.We play a game called 'tracking'.The other kids come after us.That games lasts about 3 hours then it is time for tea.After tea I watch television until it is time for bed.I go to bed at about 11pm.
